tasks.title: Create Users Screen
tasks.description: User management interface showing guest information, staff details, and access levels with search and filter options.

tasks.title: Create Reports Screen
tasks.description: Analytics dashboard with revenue metrics, occupancy statistics, and performance indicators. Display data in cards and charts.

tasks.title: Create Services/Access Control Screen
tasks.description: Access control management showing service permissions, user access levels, and toggle switches for different services and features.

tasks.title: Create Add License Screen
tasks.description: License management form with input fields for license details, validity dates, and activation options. Include license history section.
